title: Passion Pit - Manners [2009]
description:
Passion Pit are the latest band to rise on the back of a rare CD-R from blog curio to potential magazine covers with albums out on a major label. The Boston band formed as a way for lead singer Michael Angelakos to finish an EP he was writing for his girlfriend for Valentine's Day, and that album eventually got picked up and released by Frenchkiss. The EP, Chunk of Change, led to Passion Pit signing with Columbia in the U.K., and an expanded studio budget for Manners, their full-length debut. Like many blog-hype bands before them, the record deal allows them to expand their sonic palette to sound like something more than a bedroom project. Make sure to check out the video for the single "The Reeling"

Track Listing:

   1. Make Light
   2. Little Secrets
   3. Moth's Wings
   4. The Reeling
   5. Eyes as Candles
   6. Swimming in the Flood
   7. Folds in Your Hands
   8. To Kingdom Come
   9. Sleepyhead
  10. Let Your Love Grow Tall
  11. Seaweed Song

Please feel free to comment with any questions or concerns and enjoy!
